people.name: Drawn figures of bride and groom

insights: Child's drawing depicts wedding scene with 'Here Comes the Bride' theme
Musical notes drawn throughout indicate song/musical element
Child's phonetic spelling shows young age of contributor
Drawing includes multiple figures in formal attire
Colorful, playful presentation typical of children's artwork
Part of children's section of birthday book
Wedding theme may relate to adult relationships or child's imagination
Creative expression through both drawing and text
